title: Suzuki Access with TFT display launched at Rs 1.02 lakh
description: Suzuki Access now has a new top-spec variant with a 4.2-inch TFT dash. Its price is Rs 1.02 lakh (ex-showroom, Delhi). The Access gets a new blue colour, too It remains mechanically unchanged Suzuki Access launched with TFT dash Along with a new display, it also gets a new blue colour Unlike the previous Access, with this 2025 model, Suzuki is offering a new top-spec variant with a TFT display, like the Access’ other competitors. This new variant, called Ride Connect TFT, sits above the previous top-spec version, Ride Connect, and costs Rs 6,800 more than it. Suzuki has also added a new shade of blue to the Access line-up. The existing colours include matte black, matte blue, white and mint green. Priced at Rs 1.02 lakh, the Ride Connect TFT variant costs Rs 2,226 more than the Honda Activa 125, which, too, received a TFT display when it was recently updated to meet the OBD2B norms.  All prices are ex-showroom, Delhi. Also see:  2025 Suzuki Access road test, review
author: Ved Janve
excerpt: The Access with a TFT display costs Rs 6,800 more than the previous top variant.

html:
Suzuki Access now has a new top-spec variant with a 4.2-inch TFT dash. Its price is Rs 1.02 lakh (ex-showroom, Delhi).

  1. The Access gets a new blue colour, too
  2. It remains mechanically unchanged

Suzuki Access launched with TFT dash

Along with a new display, it also gets a new blue colour

Unlike the previous Access, with this 2025 model, Suzuki is offering a new top-spec variant with a TFT display, like the Access’ other competitors. This new variant, called Ride Connect TFT, sits above the previous top-spec version, Ride Connect, and costs Rs 6,800 more than it.

Suzuki has also added a new shade of blue to the Access line-up. The existing colours include matte black, matte blue, white and mint green.

Priced at Rs 1.02 lakh, the Ride Connect TFT variant costs Rs 2,226 more than the Honda Activa 125, which, too, received a TFT display when it was recently updated to meet the OBD2B norms. 

All prices are ex-showroom, Delhi.
